title: Ep. - 416 - JFK ASSASSINATION JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
description:
Kate discusses The Armenian Dating Show on YouTube and Twas the Fight Before Christmas on Apple TV.

 

An interview with James DiEugenio about the documentary JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass. Thirty years after his film JFK, filmmaker Oliver Stone takes viewers on a journey though recently declassified evidence in the assassination of President Kennedy -- the most consequential American murder mystery of the twentieth century. Joined by Oscar-winning narrators Whoopi Goldberg and Donald Sutherland, as well as a distinguished team of forensics, medical and ballistics experts, historians, and witnesses. DiEugenio wrote the screenplay based on his book Destiny Betrayed: JFK, Cuba, and the Garrison Case.

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
